mapper.insert: INSERT INTO students (name, furigana, nickname, mail_address, address, age, gender, remark, is_deleted) VALUES (#{name}, #{furigana}, #{nickname}, #{mailAddress}, #{address}, #{age}, #{gender}, #{remark}, false)

INSERT INTO courses (student_id, course_name, course_detail, course_start_date, course_end_date, is_deleted) VALUES (#{studentId}, #{courseName}, #{courseDetail}, #{courseStartDate}, #{courseEndDate}, false)
